original_text: Speak thou also unto the children of Israel, saying, Verily my sabbaths ye shall keep: for it is a sign between me and you throughout your generations; that ye may know that I am the Lord that doth sanctify you.
korean_text: 너는 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르기를 너희는 나의 안식일을 지키라 이는 나와 너희 사이에 너희 대대의 표징이니 나는 너희를 거룩하게 하는 여호와인 줄 너희가 알게 함이라

sentences.original_text: Speak thou also unto the children of Israel
saying, Verily my sabbaths ye shall keep
sentences.korean_translation: 이르되 너희는 나의 안식일을 반드시 지키라

sentences.original_text: for it is a sign between me and you
that ye may know that I am the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 내가 여호와인 줄 알게 하려 함이라
